location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of a copy of a memorandum that was sent from the Political Residency to the Political Agents in Bahrain, Kuwait and Muscat. The memorandum informs them that in the case of any non-Arab person or entity wishing to make a presentation of any kind to the ruler of their respective jurisdictions, the Political Residency should immediately be informed of the request before any decision is taken.
